Texts.Eng: I have a ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; here for you! ^orange;Try out its ^green;3^orange; primary functions^reset; as soon as possible. Open up the ^green;Right-Click^reset; menu from it and look for a task you wish to attempt. Select it.

Use your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; now, and create ^orange;9 Wire^reset; and ^green;bring them to me^reset;. I'll jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset; so that you can ^green;warp to distant locations^reset; such as the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;!.
